articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The celebrity chef and broadcaster denied a number of allegations published in an investigation by ITV News.
articles.title: TV chef Gino D'Acampo denies inappropriate behaviour claims

articles.description: The royals will make a state visit to Italy in April, which coincides with their 20th wedding anniversary.
articles.title: King and Queen to host Stanley Tucci ahead of Italy state visit

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The island has experienced thousands of quakes in the past week, forcing evacuations of residents.
articles.title: Santorini rocked by more earthquakes as uncertainty grows

articles.description: The prize went unclaimed for 13 days.
articles.title: EuroMillions jackpot of £83m claimed

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The actor and comedian has been banned for two months instead of six, meaning filming can go-ahead.
articles.title: Steve Coogan uses The Trip to avoid lengthier driving ban

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The outraged passenger hires a lawyer to dispute the fine over a public phone call in Nantes.
articles.title: Man fined for loudspeaker call at French station

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Two women had abortions after an NHS trust mistakenly told them their babies had serious conditions, the BBC has learned.
articles.title: We aborted healthy babies after NHS mistakes, couples tell BBC

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The government wants to make it quicker and easier to build mini nuclear power stations in England and Wales.
articles.title: 'Build baby build', says Keir Starmer as he sets out nuclear plan

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Bank boss Andrew Bailey told the BBC it expected to cut rates further but warned the road ahead would be bumpy.
articles.title: Interest rates cut but Bank of England halves growth forecast

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Teammates of Jenni Hermoso have testified in a trial over a kiss between her and former football chief Luis Rubiales.
articles.title: Spain's Hermoso was 'overwhelmed' after World Cup kiss, court hears
